results.content: I payed for this course and the common files which are needed for all the lessons are missing. I asked the instructor about it over a month ago and he has not yet replied.

response.content: Hi Eric, totally sorry about this. I didn't get any notification about the message and it was completely missed. :( I have added the link to the common files in the course messages. Please check it out and I'm happy to answer any more questions. :)
